initial_frequencies.name: Delta Waves
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of deep, dreamless sleep and profound physical restoration. Delta waves are essential for healing, regeneration, and accessing the unconscious mind.

initial_frequencies.name: Theta Waves
initial_frequencies.description: The state of deep meditation, creativity, and intuition. Theta waves are the gateway to learning, memory, and vivid visualization. The 'flow state' frequency.

initial_frequencies.name: Alpha Waves
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of relaxed, focused awareness. Alpha waves are present during light meditation and daydreaming, promoting calm and reducing stress.

initial_frequencies.name: Beta Waves
initial_frequencies.description: The state of normal waking consciousness. Beta waves are associated with logical thinking, problem-solving, and focused, alert attention.

initial_frequencies.name: Gamma Waves
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of peak performance and high-level information processing. Gamma waves are associated with intense focus, insight, and expanded consciousness.

initial_frequencies.name: 40 Hz Gamma (Precise)
initial_frequencies.description: A specific Gamma frequency linked in research to enhanced cognitive function, memory recall, and potential benefits for brain health.

initial_frequencies.name: 174 Hz - Pain & Stress Relief
initial_frequencies.description: The foundational Solfeggio tone. This frequency acts as a natural anesthetic, helping to relieve pain and providing your organs with a sense of security and love.

initial_frequencies.name: 285 Hz - Tissue & Organ Healing
initial_frequencies.description: This frequency helps to heal and regenerate tissues by sending a message to the body's cells and organs, encouraging them to return to their original, healthy state.

initial_frequencies.name: 396 Hz - Liberation from Fear
initial_frequencies.description: Release guilt and fear. This frequency helps to cleanse subconscious blockages, liberating you from negative beliefs and empowering you to achieve your goals.

initial_frequencies.name: 417 Hz - Facilitating Change
initial_frequencies.description: Clear traumatic experiences and destructive influences. This frequency cleanses negative energy and facilitates conscious and subconscious change.

initial_frequencies.name: 528 Hz - Transformation & Miracles
initial_frequencies.description: The 'miracle' tone for transformation and DNA repair. This frequency is associated with increased life force, clarity, and spiritual enlightenment.

initial_frequencies.name: 639 Hz - Harmonizing Relationships
initial_frequencies.description: Connect and harmonize relationships. This frequency fosters love, tolerance, and understanding, enhancing communication with others.

initial_frequencies.name: 741 Hz - Awakening Intuition
initial_frequencies.description: Cleanse the cells from toxins. This frequency aids in self-expression, problem-solving, and purifying the body and mind.

initial_frequencies.name: 852 Hz - Returning to Spiritual Order
initial_frequencies.description: Awaken intuition and return to spiritual order. This frequency helps you connect with a higher power and your own inner vision.

initial_frequencies.name: 963 Hz - Divine Oneness
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of divine oneness. This tone awakens any system to its original, perfect state, connecting you to the unity of all things.

initial_frequencies.name: 1782 Hz - Soul Star Alchemy
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of alchemy and transmutation. Associated with the Soul Star chakra, it is the gateway to higher dimensions, ruling over eternal change, metamorphosis, and the ability to transform matter and energy.

initial_frequencies.name: 111 Hz - Angelic Connection
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of angelic connection and spiritual guidance. Resonates with the flow of the universe and divine timing.

initial_frequencies.name: 222 Hz - Trust & Harmony
initial_frequencies.description: A frequency of trust, balance, and harmony. Encourages you to have faith in your journey and the path you are on.

initial_frequencies.name: 333 Hz - Divine Support
initial_frequencies.description: A powerful frequency indicating that your spiritual guides are near, offering love, support, and encouragement.

initial_frequencies.name: 444 Hz - Protection & Shielding
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of protection and spiritual shielding. A sign that you are on the right path and surrounded by divine protection.

initial_frequencies.name: 555 Hz - Major Life Changes
initial_frequencies.description: A frequency that signals major life changes are on the horizon. Encourages you to embrace transformation and release the old.

initial_frequencies.name: 666 Hz - Realign Your Thoughts
initial_frequencies.description: A call to re-examine and realign your thoughts with your spiritual truth. A frequency for finding balance between the material and spiritual.

initial_frequencies.name: 777 Hz - Luck & Divine Magic
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of luck, miracles, and divine magic. A sign that you are in alignment with the universe and good fortune is on its way.

initial_frequencies.name: 888 Hz - Infinite Abundance
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of infinite abundance and prosperity. Resonates with financial blessings and the flow of universal wealth.

initial_frequencies.name: 999 Hz - Completion
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of completion. Signals the end of a chapter in your life, preparing you for a new beginning.

initial_frequencies.name: Schumann Resonance
initial_frequencies.description: The Earth's natural frequency, or 'heartbeat.' This grounding frequency promotes balance, calm, and a deep connection to the planet.

initial_frequencies.name: Sun
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of vitality, life force, and the self. The Sun's energy promotes confidence, radiance, and personal power.

initial_frequencies.name: Moon
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of emotion, intuition, and the subconscious. The Moon's energy enhances receptivity and psychic awareness.

initial_frequencies.name: Venus
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of love, beauty, and harmony. Venus's energy fosters connection, compassion, and appreciation for art and nature.

initial_frequencies.name: Mars
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of action, drive, and courage. Mars's energy boosts motivation, determination, and physical stamina.

initial_frequencies.name: Jupiter
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of expansion, abundance, and wisdom. Jupiter's energy promotes growth, optimism, and good fortune.

initial_frequencies.name: Saturn
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of discipline, structure, and karma. Saturn's energy supports responsibility, focus, and long-term goals.

initial_frequencies.name: Uranus
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of innovation, rebellion, and sudden change. Uranus's energy sparks breakthroughs and liberation from old patterns.

initial_frequencies.name: Pluto
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of transformation, death, and rebirth. Pluto's energy supports deep healing and the transmutation of shadow aspects.

initial_frequencies.name: Mercury
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of communication, intellect, and reason. Mercury's energy enhances mental clarity, speeds up thought processes, and facilitates clear expression.

initial_frequencies.name: Neptune
initial_frequencies.description: The frequency of intuition, dreams, and the subconscious mind. Neptune's energy dissolves boundaries, enhances creativity, and connects you to the mystical.

initial_frequencies.name: 727 Hz - General Vitality
initial_frequencies.description: A foundational Rife frequency often used as a general tonic to support overall vitality, energy levels, and systemic balance.

initial_frequencies.name: 880 Hz - Neural & Allergy Support
initial_frequencies.description: A Rife frequency commonly associated with supporting the nervous system and providing energetic relief for allergy symptoms.

initial_frequencies.name: Inflammation Support
initial_frequencies.description: A protocol combining Rife frequencies associated with reducing inflammation to support the body's natural healing response.

initial_frequencies.name: Pain Relief
initial_frequencies.description: A set of Rife frequencies designed to energetically address pain signals and support the body's natural pain-relief mechanisms.

initial_frequencies.name: Vision Restoration
initial_frequencies.description: A frequency to support the intricate systems of the eye, promoting clarity and long-term health.

initial_frequencies.name: Fascia Release
initial_frequencies.description: A frequency designed to energetically release tension in the body's fascial network, promoting flexibility and relieving stiffness.

initial_frequencies.name: 633 Hz - Radiant Vitality
initial_frequencies.description: A unique frequency associated with radiant vitality, energy, and a vibrant bio-field.

initial_frequencies.name: Metabolic Support
initial_frequencies.description: A frequency used to support a healthy and balanced metabolism, targeting the thyroid and adrenal systems.

initial_frequencies.name: Lymphatic Support
initial_frequencies.description: A low-frequency pulse to support the body's lymphatic system, encouraging gentle detoxification and flow. Delivered with an audible carrier wave.

initial_frequencies.name: Parasite Cleanse
initial_frequencies.description: A protocol utilizing frequencies (20Hz, 440Hz, 727Hz) traditionally associated in Rife research with creating an inhospitable environment for systemic parasites.

initial_frequencies.name: NAD+ Booster
initial_frequencies.description: A Rife-inspired frequency designed to support the body's natural production of NAD+, a crucial coenzyme for cellular energy, repair, and longevity.

initial_frequencies.name: Isochronic Alpha
initial_frequencies.description: A 10 Hz isochronic pulse for deep, clear-headed relaxation and stress reduction. Perfect for entering a meditative state quickly.

initial_frequencies.name: Isochronic Theta
initial_frequencies.description: A 6 Hz isochronic pulse to access deep creativity, intuition, and enhanced memory consolidation. Ideal for creative visualization.

initial_frequencies.name: Isochronic Beta
initial_frequencies.description: A 20 Hz isochronic pulse for sharp focus and mental energy. Use this for intense work sessions or to combat mental fatigue.

initial_frequencies.name: Isochronic Gamma
initial_frequencies.description: A 40 Hz isochronic pulse for peak cognitive performance, problem-solving, and accessing states of high creativity.

initial_frequencies.name: Isochronic Delta Sleep
initial_frequencies.description: A 2.5 Hz isochronic pulse to guide your brain into deep, restorative delta sleep. Ideal for overcoming insomnia.

initial_frequencies.name: Acoustic Face Lift
initial_frequencies.description: A combination of Solfeggio frequencies (528Hz for repair, 639Hz for connection) intended to support facial muscle tone and skin vitality.

initial_frequencies.name: Collagen & Elastin
initial_frequencies.description: A frequency protocol using deep Delta waves (2.5Hz) and specific Rife tones to energetically support the body's natural production of collagen and elastin.

initial_frequencies.name: Hair Growth & Restoration
initial_frequencies.description: A set of frequencies intended to stimulate blood flow to the scalp and support healthy hair follicle function.

initial_frequencies.name: White Noise
initial_frequencies.description: A sound containing all frequencies at equal intensity. Excellent for masking distracting background noises to improve focus or sleep.

initial_frequencies.name: Gentle Rain
initial_frequencies.description: The soothing, rhythmic sound of gentle rain. Perfect for relaxation, meditation, or creating a calm atmosphere for sleep.

initial_frequencies.name: Pink Noise
initial_frequencies.description: A balanced sound with more power in the lower frequencies. Softer than white noise, it's ideal for sustained focus and relaxation.

initial_frequencies.name: Brown Noise
initial_frequencies.description: A deep, rumbling sound with dominant low frequencies. Highly effective for deep relaxation and blocking out intrusive noises.

initial_frequencies.name: Ocean Waves
initial_frequencies.description: The calming ebb and flow of ocean waves. A deeply relaxing soundscape that connects you to the rhythm of nature.

inspirational_quotes.quote: If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.
inspirational_quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

inspirational_quotes.quote: The body is held together by sound. The presence of disease indicates that some of the sounds have gone out of tune.
inspirational_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

inspirational_quotes.quote: Everything is energy and that is all there is to it. Match the frequency of the reality you want and you cannot help but get that reality.
inspirational_quotes.author: Albert Einstein (attr.)

inspirational_quotes.quote: At the root of all power and motion, there is music and rhythm, the play of patterned frequencies against the matrix of time.
inspirational_quotes.author: George Leonard

inspirational_quotes.quote: The sound of the external world is a vibration. The sound of the internal world is also a vibration. The two are inseparably linked.
inspirational_quotes.author: Amit Ray

inspirational_quotes.quote: Vibrate the cosmos. The cosmos shall clear the path.
inspirational_quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

inspirational_quotes.quote: The knower of the mystery of sound knows the mystery of the whole universe.
inspirational_quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

inspirational_quotes.quote: Change your frequency, change your life.
inspirational_quotes.author: Anonymous

inspirational_quotes.quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.
inspirational_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven
